name: Python Developer (for Big Data training)
description:
We’re launching an intensive 2-month full-time education program and looking for experienced Python developers who are willing to move to the Big Data stack.

Requirements:

  • 1+ years of experience in Python
  • 2+ years of experience in software development
  • Hands-on experience in SQL, MySQL
  • Experience with Linux operating systems
  • Upper-Intermediate English
  • Good communication skills
  • Ability to learn fast

Will be a plus:

  • Experience in Hadoop
  • Experience with Cloud technologies
  • Hands-on working experience with PySpark and Shell scripts
  • Big Data toolsets - Hive / Impala

We offer:

  • Opportunity to work on bleeding-edge projects
  • Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
  • Competitive salary
  • Flexible schedule
  • Medical insurance
  • Benefits program
  • Corporate social events
  • Professional development opportunities

About us:

Grid Dynamics is an engineering services company known for transformative, mission-critical cloud solutions for retail, finance, and technology sectors. We architected some of the busiest e-commerce services on the Internet and have never had an outage during the peak season. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in San Ramon, California with offices throughout the US and Eastern Europe, we focus on big data analytics, scalable omnichannel services, DevOps, and cloud enablement
